attributes.title: God awful

attributes.title: Wastes battery.
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded it wasted my battery percentage by 50 percent in just 10 minutes.

attributes.title: worst app ever 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢😒😒😒😒
attributes.review: if i could give this app 0 stars i would it took three days to download when i had perfectly good wifi, and when i tried to use it it kept glitching to this atrocious ugly orange face 🤢😡  i will be beefing years of therapy for the disgustingly ugly face i saw. please do not get this app you will have severe trauma 😔

attributes.title: Unbelievable

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: This app is trash. It made me sacrifice my cat to help defeat Joe Biden, which I thankfully did not do. It also made trump supporters appear at my house and throw oranges at it. Trump needs to pay for what he’s done.
I mean do I even have to say anything like there is just so many things wrong with this app like come on
